name: Jabby Cat
description:
Best game of 2021!!!



You are a cat. Break stuff.



Destroy your owner’s valuables, patience, and dignity. Just because you can.
Smash precious objects like vases, house plants, and cakes to cause maximum destruction.



Earn coins to unlock new cats, accessories, and victory dances.
If they didn’t want this, they wouldn’t have gotten a cat in the first place.



Who wants cuddles?
